nodes.text: The decay mites were insects native to Talus, found also on Corellia.
Decay mites walked on six legs, and possessed two grasping arms with pincers, eight limbs in total. One subspecies was known as dung mite, also found on Talus.
During the Galactic Civil War, a pack of giant decay mites lived in a cave on the planet Talus.
Decay mites appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online role-playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
